metadata.title: CVE-2024-2612 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: If an attacker could find a way to trigger a particular code path in`SafeRefPtr`, it could have triggered a crash or potentially be leveragedto achieve code execution. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 124,Firefox ESR < 115.9, and Thunderbird < 115.9.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
